term.title: autacoid

item.text: A biological substance secreted by various cells whose physiological activity is restricted to the vicinity of its release; it is often referred to as a local hormone.

sources.item: PAC, 1998, 70, 1129. 'Glossary of terms used in medicinal chemistry (IUPAC Recommendations 1998)' on page 1129 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199870051129)

term.citation: Citation: 'autacoid' in IUPAC Compendium of Chemical Terminology, 5th ed. International Union of Pure and Applied Chemistry; 2025. Online version 5.0.0, 2025. 10.1351/goldbook.AT06796

Users of these terms are encouraged to include the version of a term with its use and to check regularly for updates to term definitions that you are using.
